p: SZ I.1 is both an incomplete and a provisional analysis of ex-sistence: it merely lays out the structures of exsistence’s way of being while leaving the interpretation of those structures for SZ I.2. SZ I.1 merely prepares for establishing ex-sistence’s temporality as the horizon [in § 65 [on temporality]. SZ I.1 merely prepares for establishing temporality. Thereafter [in SZ I.2, chapter 4] we will reinterpret the structures of SZ I.1 at a more advanced and properly ontological level.n
